00037 void EventHandler::handle_event(boost::shared_ptr<Event> event) {
00038     // check that it is not for a past time
00039     int time_difference = event->time() - time_of_last_event_;
00040     if(time_difference < 0) {
00041         // the event is in the past.
00042         throw std::invalid_argument("Event in the past!");
00043     }
00044     time_of_last_event_ = event->time();
00045 
00046     // Try to cast the pointer to look event, compute event, handle_request event
00047     // to see what kind of event it is.
00048     // The cast will return NULL if it is the wrong kind of event.
00049     // A shared_ptr pointing to NULL converts to FALSE in a condition.
00050     if(boost::shared_ptr<LookEvent> look_event = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<LookEvent>(event)) {
00051         handle_look_event(look_event);
00052     } else if(boost::shared_ptr<ComputeEvent> compute_event = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<ComputeEvent>(event)) {
00053         handle_compute_event(compute_event);
00054     } else if(boost::shared_ptr<HandleRequestsEvent> handle_requests_event =
00055               boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<HandleRequestsEvent> (event)) {
00056         handle_handle_requests_event(handle_requests_event);
00057     } else {
00058         throw std::invalid_argument("Illegal type of event.");
00059     }
00060 
00061     // update all simulation listeners
00062     update_listeners(event);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void EventHandler::handle_look_event(boost::shared_ptr<LookEvent> look_event) {
00066   BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<Robot> robot, look_event->robot_subset()) {
00067       robot_control_->compute_view(*robot);
00068   }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void EventHandler::handle_compute_event(boost::shared_ptr<ComputeEvent> compute_event) {
00072   BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<Robot> robot, compute_event->robot_subset()) {
00073       // compute the requests for this robot.
00074       std::set<boost::shared_ptr<Request> > request_set = robot_control_->compute_new_request(*robot);
00075 
00076       // add the requests to the event.
00077       BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<Request> request, request_set) {
00078           compute_event->add_to_requests(request);
00079       }
00080   }
00081 }
00082 
00083 void EventHandler::handle_handle_requests_event(boost::shared_ptr<HandleRequestsEvent> handle_requests_event) {
00084     // produce extrapolated world information
00085     boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation> new_world_information =
00086         extrapolate_old_world_information(handle_requests_event->time());
00087 
00088     // handle requests
00089     BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<const Request> request, handle_requests_event->requests()) {
00090 
00091         // Try to cast the pointer to all types of request to see what kind of request it is.
00092         // The cast will return NULL if it is the wrong kind of event.
00093         // A shared_ptr pointing to NULL converts to FALSE in a condition.
00094         if(boost::shared_ptr<const PositionRequest> position_request =
00095            boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const PositionRequest> (request)) {
00096             if(position_request_handler_) {
00097                 position_request_handler_->handle_request(new_world_information, position_request);
00098             } else {
00099                 std::cerr << "No Position Request Handler Set" << std::endl;
00100             }
00101         } else if(boost::shared_ptr<const AccelerationRequest> acceleration_request =
00102                   boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const AccelerationRequest> (request)) {
00103             if(acceleration_request_handler_) {
00104                 acceleration_request_handler_->handle_request(new_world_information, acceleration_request);
00105             } else {
00106                 std::cerr << "No Acceleration Request Handler Set" << std::endl;
00107             }
00108         } else if(boost::shared_ptr<const MarkerRequest> marker_request =
00109                   boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const MarkerRequest> (request)) {
00110             if(marker_request_handler_) {
00111                 marker_request_handler_->handle_request(new_world_information, marker_request);
00112             } else {
00113                 std::cerr << "No Marker Request Handler Set" << std::endl;
00114             }
00115         } else if(boost::shared_ptr<const TypeChangeRequest> type_change_request =
00116                   boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const TypeChangeRequest>(request)) {
00117             if(type_change_request_handler_) {
00118                 type_change_request_handler_->handle_request(new_world_information, type_change_request);
00119             } else {
00120                 std::cerr << "No Type Change Request Handler Set" << std::endl;
00121             }
00122         } else if(boost::shared_ptr<const VelocityRequest> velocity_request =
00123                   boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const VelocityRequest> (request)) {
00124             if(velocity_request_handler_) {
00125                 velocity_request_handler_->handle_request(new_world_information, velocity_request);
00126             } else {
00127                 std::cerr << "No Velocity Request Handler Set" << std::endl;
00128             }
00129         } else {
00130             throw std::invalid_argument("Illegal type of request.");
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134     // push back new world information
00135     history_->insert(new_world_information);
00136 }
00137 
00138 boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation> EventHandler::extrapolate_old_world_information(int time) {
00139     // create new world information
00140     boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation> new_world_information(new WorldInformation());
00141 
00142     // get the old world information to extrapolate from
00143     WorldInformation old_world_information = history_->get_newest();
00144 
00145     // set the time
00146     new_world_information->set_time(time);
00147 
00148     // compute the time difference between old and new world_infrmation
00149     int time_difference = time - old_world_information.time();
00150 
00151     // extrapolate all robots
00152     BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> old_robot, old_world_information.robot_data()) {
00153         // TODO(craupach) this unnecessarily copies position and velocity. May be too inefficient.
00154         boost::shared_ptr<RobotData> new_robot(new RobotData(*old_robot));
00155         new_robot->set_position(old_robot->extrapolated_position(time_difference));
00156         new_robot->set_velocity(old_robot->extrapolated_velocity(time_difference));
00157 
00158         // insert new robot
00159         // TODO(craupach) test if this preserves the ordering. There should be a way of inserting at a specific
00160         // position in the array
00161         new_world_information->add_robot_data(new_robot);
00162     }
00163 
00164     // copy all obstacles
00165     BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> old_obstacle, old_world_information.obstacles()) {
00166         boost::shared_ptr<Obstacle> new_obstacle = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Obstacle>(old_obstacle->clone());
00167         new_world_information->add_obstacle(new_obstacle);
00168     }
00169 
00170     // copy all markers
00171     BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> old_marker, old_world_information.markers()) {
00172         boost::shared_ptr<WorldObject> new_marker(new WorldObject(*old_marker));
00173         new_world_information->add_marker(new_marker);
00174     }
00175 
00176     return new_world_information;
00177 }
00178 
00179 void EventHandler::register_listener(boost::shared_ptr<SimulationListener> listener) {
00180     listeners_.push_back(listener);
00181 }
00182 
00183 void EventHandler::update_listeners(boost::shared_ptr<Event> event) {
00184     BOOST_FOREACH(boost::shared_ptr<SimulationListener> listener, listeners_) {
00185         listener->update(history_->get_newest(), event);
00186     }
00187 }
